channel.title: [PI]Item On Object
channel.description:
I just want to make it so when you use a key on a door it opens. I've made so it wont open on just a click.
I thought i just could add this code: [CODE]case 2559: // The door if(itemId = 3606) { // The key c.getPA().object(-1, obX, obY, 0, 0); //This is the code used for all of the other global doors and other stuff. } [/CODE]
But i just get the error that the variable itemId cannot be found. Arent i suppose to import where the itemId variable is made? I tried importing everything with "itemId" in it but it still wouldnt work... Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: [PI]Item On Object
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:469623”]…

item = 3606

Let me teach you something.

= assigns the variable.
== checks if it’s equal to.

So, it’s

item == 3606

Also, it’s only one action, you remove the object and then add the new object. Not just add the object.[/quote]

No. You’re way off, man.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Item On Object
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

…

item = 3606

Let me teach you something.

= assigns the variable.
== checks if it’s equal to.

So, it’s

item == 3606

Also, it’s only one action, you remove the object and then add the new object. Not just add the object.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Item On Object
item.dc:creator: @Gamerburn Gamerburn
item.description:
@Gamerburn wrote:

I just want to make it so when you use a key on a door it opens.
I’ve made so it wont open on just a click.

I thought i just could add this code:

case 2559: // The door if(itemId = 3606) { // The key c.getPA().object(-1, obX, obY, 0, 0); //This is the code used for all of the other global doors and other stuff. }

But i just get the error that the variable itemId cannot be found. Arent i suppose to import where the itemId variable is made? I tried importing everything with “itemId” in it but it still wouldnt work… Anyone know how to fix this?
